election_record.label: Massachusetts 1812 House of Representatives, Barre

overview.note: "With joy you will hail the triumph of WASHINGTON principles in this town. Maj. NATHANIEL JONES, and Gen. SAMUEL LEE, staunch Federal Republicans, are elected Representatives, vice Mr. D. WADSWORTH, a mad Jeffersonian. The scales are rapidly falling from the eyes of honest men whom Democracy had allured into her destructive paths." Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 9, 1812.

election_record.reference: Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 9, 1812.
